Question: The show was co-written by Chas Early and Richard Hurst, and imagined this person's view of the world 10 years after his death.
Hints: Members of Tool felt that they and this person "were resonating similar concepts".
This person was voted "Hot Standup Comic" by Rolling Stone magazine in 1993.
This person's mother, Mary, appeared on the January 30, 2009 episode of Late Show.
